 2002-06742002-04-250,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ICC,  DPM
PrecisRegulations Amending the SPECIAL SERVICES AND FEES REGULATIONS by deleting the reference to Registered Mail packets addressed to the U.S.A., by clarifying the meaning of the term "fragile", by reducing the claim period for lost or damaged domestic items from 12 months to 90 days, and by removing the fee for an Acknowledgement of Receipt in respect of Registered Mail sent to a place outside Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2002-0167 Publication Date: 2002-05-08
Attachments
